cont.entity_a: Runs on USB power and is driverless.
Useful sound enhancements that can be turned off.
Still functional as of May 2018 on various operating systems. Compatible with iPod and various speaker systems. Some compatibility issues with Mac and Windows 7.
cont.entity_b: Compatibility issues with ExpressCard slots. Not recommended for low-end laptops.

cont.entity_a: Solves sound card issues for little money. Affordable price with good sound quality. Offers good sound improvement for a low price.
Improves sound quality significantly, reducing white noise. Improves sound quality for digital recordings. Enhances MP3 sound quality effectively.
cont.entity_b: Clear sound with rich bass. Provides better sound than standard laptop sound cards. Works well for music and games. Suitable for high-end games. Some users experience static issues.

cont.entity_a: Easy to install on Windows and Ubuntu.
Stylish design with a useful carry bag.
Some features like CMSS-3D and Crystalizer may not benefit all music.
cont.entity_b: Includes S/PDIF and fiber optic output.
